metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0991 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.333 and19.x through 21.x before 21.0.0.182 on Windows and OS X and before11.2.202.577 on Linux, Adobe AIR before 21.0.0.176, Adobe AIR SDK before21.0.0.176, and Adobe AIR SDK & Compiler before 21.0.0.176 allows attackersto execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors, a differentvulnerability than CVE-2016-0987, CVE-2016-0988, CVE-2016-0990,CVE-2016-0994, CVE-2016-0995, CVE-2016-0996, CVE-2016-0997, CVE-2016-0998,CVE-2016-0999, and CVE-2016-1000.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0991` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.577ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.577ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.577ubuntu0.14.04.1').
